snippet.title: The Sims 4 Vampires: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Transform your Sims into powerful vampires and live for eternity in an eerie new destination with The Sims 4 Vampires.

Learn more about this Game Pack: http://x.ea.com/27897 
What kind of vampire are you? Take the quiz: http://x.ea.com/27898 

Create a variety of vampires using all-new tools and unlock unique Powers that give your Sims supernatural abilities. Escape to Forgotten Hollow, build a lair, and hang out with other immortals.
